2091920.name: Witches and Butchers
2091920.description:
Witches and Butchers is a throwback horizontal scrolling "Shoot 'em up" with Roleplaying elements.
Set in a fantasy world, you play as Lluuvia, a Witch with the power of cooking magic-infused dishes, she embarks in a mission to defeat an army of beasts that are stealing and eating all the food in the region!

Adventure is always better with friends!
As the story progresses, more characters tag along with Lluuvia to help her out, you can bring a companion and switch between them before each stage. Each character has a set of upgradeable skills and stats and are capable of healing, setting up protective barriers, destroy all enemies on screen with a bomb among other useful abilities!

Authentic Retro Feel!
Witches and Butchers features 8-bit retro graphics and easy controls, it is a new game in the spirit of 90's classics.
This game replicates the strengths and limitations of handheld consoles of years ago while adding some modern touches to the experience to make the game accessible to all players!

Eat and Grow!
This game features a Cooking System where you gather ingredients by completing quests and exploring the world, then cooking different dishes to increase the stats of your party and unlock more abilities!
As you progress you unlock more complex recipes to strengthen the entire party and enhance their unique powers!
2091920.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
